actions.description: Generates a video based on the specified template.
actions.name: generateVideoFromTemplateAction

properties.description: Unique identifier of the generated video.
properties.name: video_id

properties.description: Unique identifier of the generated video.
properties.name: video_id

properties.description: The ID of the template.
properties.label: Template ID
properties.name: template_id

properties.description: Unique identifier of the folder where the video is stored.
properties.label: Folder ID
properties.name: folder_id

properties.description: Whether to enable captions in the video.
properties.label: Caption
properties.name: caption

properties.description: Whether to make the video publicly shareable immediately after creation.
properties.label: Enable Sharing
properties.name: enable_sharing

actions.title: Generate Video From Template

actions.description: Translates a video into one or more of 175+ supported languages with natural-sounding voice and accurate lip-sync.
actions.name: translateVideoAction

properties.description: Unique identifier of the translated video.
properties.name: video_translate_id

properties.description: Unique identifier of the translated video.
properties.name: video_translate_id

properties.description: URL of the video file to be translated. Supports direct video file URLs, Google Drive URLs, and YouTube URLs.
properties.label: Video URL
properties.name: video_url

properties.description: The target language in which the video will be translated.
properties.label: Output Language
properties.name: output_language

properties.description: Title of the video.
properties.label: Title
properties.name: title

properties.description: Translate only the audio; ideal for videos where the speaker is not visible, such as narrations, voiceovers, etc.
properties.label: Translate Audio Only
properties.name: translate_audio_only

actions.title: Translate Video

actions.description: Uploads a media file to the authenticated user's HeyGen account.
actions.name: uploadAssetAction

properties.description: Unique identifier of the uploaded asset.
properties.name: id

properties.description: ID assigned to the uploaded asset.
properties.name: name

properties.description: Type of the uploaded asset, for example, audio, video, or image.
properties.name: file_type

properties.description: Unique identifier of the folder that contains the asset.
properties.name: folder_id

properties.description: Metadata related to the uploaded asset.
properties.name: meta

properties.description: Unix timestamp when the asset was created.
properties.name: created_ts

properties.description: URL to access or download the uploaded file.
properties.name: url

properties.description: Image key for image-type assets.
properties.name: image_key

properties.name: url

properties.description: Asset file to upload.

description: HeyGen is an AI Video Generator that lets you create explainer videos, marketing and sales promos, product demos, training and onboarding content.
name: heyGen
title: HeyGen

triggers.description: Triggers when a video generation completes successfully.
triggers.name: videoGenerationCompletedTrigger
triggers.title: Video Generation Completed

triggers.description: Triggers when a video fails to generate.
